Check out UIC's dining options elsewhere on campus. There's something for everyone!       Academic and Residential Complex (ARC)   1st Floor, 940 W. Harrison St.  ARC Starbucks   On-line order and Menu  312-413-2106  Regular Hours   Monday – Friday 7:00am – 9:00pm  Saturday & Sunday 9:00am – 5:00pm  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/20/20 Monday – Sunday 9:00am – 5:00pm        3/21/20 – 4/6/20 Monday – Friday 10:00am – 5:00pm Saturday – Sunday Closed        Resume Regular Hours TBA         Behavioral Sciences Building (BSB)   1st Floor, 1007 W. Harrison St.   Au Bon Pain Café  On-line order and Menu    Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 8:00am – 6:00pm  Friday  8:00am – 2:00pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA    Morgan Street Station Convenience Store   Regular Hours   Monday-Thursday 7:00am – 7:00pm  Friday  7:00am – 5:00pm  Saturday & Sunday 7:00am – 5:00pm   Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 4/6/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours TBA            Clinical Sciences North (CSN)   1st Floor, 820 S. Wood St.  Wood Street Cafe Convenience Store  Wood Street Cafe (Clinical Science North Building)  is open 8:00am – 4:00pm Monday -Friday (hours during Covid-19 crisis) serving Caribou Coffee, Breakfast Burritos, Fresh Pastry, Wraps, Subs, Hot Sandwiches, Soup and much more.  We care about the UI Health Community and are happy to serve you under this stressful Covid-19 crisis.  We are a Grab N Go Concept so we are listed as a Critical Food service here at UIC.  Our Store has no seating so it’s an ideal place to get some great food on the go.  We would greatly appreciate if you would patronize our store.
